description: Francis / King Regional ParkForest trails abundance of green forest growth, moss flowers fir trees. A mostly forested park of century old fur and western red cedar.
directions: Francis / King Regional  trail head is at the nature centre. From junction of Helmchen and Burnside follow Burnside road west onto Prospect Lake rd, turn right on Munn Rd, car park / nature centre located 100 metres on right.
title: Centennial Trail
